posts.text:
TEKNOLOJİDE KADINLARIN ZAMANI Başkan Doğan Belsa esnafını ziyaret etti İzmit Belediye Başkanı Dr. Nevzat Doğan, Belsa esnaflarını ziyaret etti. İşyerlerini ziyaret ederek hayırlı ve bol kazançlar dileğinde bulunan Doğan’a belediye meclis üyesi İbrahim Elgin de eşlik etti.Esnaflarla oturup, çay içip sohbet... 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:20   @BursaHaberMedya 
İzmit Belediye Başkanı Dr. Nevzat Doğan, Belsa esnaflarını ziyaret etti. İşyerlerini ziyaret ederek hayırlı ve bol kazançlar dileğinde bulunan Doğan’a belediye meclis üyesi İbrahim Elgin de eşlik etti. Esnaflarla oturup, çay içip sohbet eden, onların istek ve şikâyetlerini dinleyen Başkan Doğan, “ Belsa şehrimizin merkezi, gözbebeğimizdir. Gündüz nüfusu gece nüfusunun iki katına çıkan bir bölgedir. Belsa Alışveriş merkezimizde ve bölge esnafındaki gündüz hareketliliğinin, gece de devam etme arzusu içerisindeyiz. Vatandaşlarımıza alışverişlerini şehir merkezinden yapmalarını tavsiye ediyoruz. Belsa Alışveriş Merkezi, yapılan düzenlemelerle daha iyi duruma geldi. Çok güzel işletmeler faaliyet gösteriyor, mevcutlarda kendilerini yenilediler. Bir yandan belediyemiz, diğer yandan Belsa yönetimi binanın ve çevresinin güzelleşmesi için çalışmalarımızı sürdürüyoruz. Yine Belsa binasının çevresindeki işletmelerimiz için neler yapabiliriz diyerek kafa yoruyoruz” dedi. 1

thread.title_full: VELIKA DINAMOVA NADA MOGLA BI VEĆ NA ZIMU NAPUSTITI MAKSIMIR Za 'modrog' dragulja veliki je interes pokazao engleski prvoligaš

posts.title: VELIKA DINAMOVA NADA MOGLA BI VEĆ NA ZIMU NAPUSTITI MAKSIMIR Za 'modrog' dragulja veliki je interes pokazao engleski prvoligaš
posts.text:
Foto: Zeljko Hajdinjak / Cropix ODLAZAK NA OTOK? VELIKA DINAMOVA NADA MOGLA BI VEĆ NA ZIMU NAPUSTITI MAKSIMIR Za 'modrog' dragulja veliki je interes pokazao engleski prvoligaš AUTOR: 07.11.2017. u 09:57 Podijeli: 
Mladi vratar Dinama , na posudbi u Lokomotivi , Adrian Šemper mogao bi na zimu napustiti Maksimir (i Kajzericu). Naime, saznajemo da je engleski premierligaš Watford ozbiljno zagrizao za Šempera i već krenuo akciju, te da bi ga u siječnju volio dovesti na Otok. 
Priča nije neozbiljna, potvrđena nam je i iz engleskih izvora, a sjećamo se da je Šemper već ljetos bio u Engleskoj, upravo je Watford klub koji ga je pozvao i s kojim su on i njegov agent razgovarali, uz Dinamovo dopuštenje. Jasno, kad se radi o Engleskoj, uvijek se javlja problem radne dozvole, no kad je transfer dovoljno visok, a ovaj bi mogao biti te kad se radi o mladom igraču, onda je, kao i u slučaju Nikole Vlašića , radnu dozvolu lakše dobiti. Zeljko Hajdinjak / Cropix / CROPIX 
Šemper je već godinama u samom vrhu raznih izbora i rang-lista mladih vratara, uz bok sad popularnom Svilaru , primjerice, kojega je prošle godine potpuno zasjenio u dvoboju Anderlechta i Dinama u junuiorskoj Ligi prvaka . Pomalo nes(p)retna epizoda u prvoj momčadi Dinama sad je iza Šempera , u Lokomotivi brani dobro, pa nije čudno da plijeni interes europskih klubova. 
Nije Watford jedini, Šempera već neko vrijeme gleda i Red Bull Leipzig , također je priča otišla dalje od pukog interesa, međutim, teško će Nijemci parirati Englezima. Također, šuška se kako ta dva kluba nisu jedina koja 'ganjaju' Šempera , pa ne treba čuditi ako on bude među prvima koji će otići iz Maksimira . Tagovi Nogomet Vezane vijesti FOTO, VIDEO: NOVI ŠOK ZA RIJEKU USRED ZAGREBA Nastavlja se agonija: Lokomotiva srušila prvaka u Kranjčevićevoj fantastičnim golom mladog dragulja Najčitanije

thread.title: Obras del teleférico ponen en riesgo dinámica de Galipán – El Universal (Venezuela)
thread.title_full: Obras del teleférico ponen en riesgo dinámica de Galipán – El Universal (Venezuela)

posts.author: Redacción - Caracas
posts.title: Obras del teleférico ponen en riesgo dinámica de Galipán – El Universal (Venezuela)
posts.text:
Seis consejos comunales de Galipán alertaron sobre las consecuencias que las obras del teleférico, que va desde el Ávila a Macuto, tendrán sobre la dinámica del pueblo donde viven 2.500 personas en unas 500 viviendas.
Exigieron a las autoridades que el teleférico se construya por su lugar de origen pues, de lo contrario, se generarán serios inconvenientes en el poblado y delitos contra el ecosistema del principal pulmón natural de la ciudad: el Ávila, creando erosión y movimientos de tierra que pueden ocasionar desastres ecológicos. 
En un comunicado dirigido a Ventel, la empresa constructora del teleférico por la ruta modificada, plantean que la obra afectará el medio ambiente con nuevas construcciones y algunas partes de la estructura del sistema perjudicarán las siembras y viviendas de los vecinos.
“El Parque Temático y la Nueva Estación Museo aumentarían la contaminación ambiental por los desechos sólidos de los visitantes, el humo de los tubos de escape y la contaminación sónica”, dice el comunicado. Los galipaneros temen por su economía pues su oferta de servicios de estilo rural y familiar se verán relegados por el “mega parque de atracciones” que estará ubicado lejos de los centros de gastronomía y recreación de Galipán. 
Contenido relacionado
La disponibilidad del servicio eléctrico y de agua es otra de las amenazas pues los nuevos proyectos se abastecerían de los pozos y manantiales que surten al sector y que son insuficientes. “Además nuestras calles no soportan el peso de los vehículos y cargas para la construcción de la estación”. La comunidad ha solicitado plantear estos problemas en mesas técnicas con la presencia del Gobernador de Vargas, pero no han sido atendidas sus peticiones. 
A pesar de la controversia desatada por el nuevo trazado de la ruta del teleférico, hay vecinos que aseguran que la comunidad no puede estar de espaldas a una obra tan importante y que la misma debe ser usada para desarrollar proyectos que permitan resolver los problemas de los galipaneros.
Ir a la fuente 
La entrada Obras del teleférico ponen en riesgo dinámica de Galipán – El Universal (Venezuela) aparece primero en EXTRA! Noticias Venezuela .

thread.title: Escambia Tax Preparer Gets Federal Prison For Tax Fraud
thread.title_full: Escambia Tax Preparer Gets Federal Prison For Tax Fraud

posts.author: William
posts.title: Escambia Tax Preparer Gets Federal Prison For Tax Fraud
posts.text:
Escambia Tax Preparer Gets Federal Prison For Tax Fraud 
November 7, 2017 
An Escambia County tax preparer has been sentenced to federal prison for tax fraud. 
Christopher Jacob Rankins, 33, was sentenced to serve 18 months in prison after pleading guilty to 12 counts of aiding or assisting others in the preparation of false tax returns. In addition, Rankins was ordered to pay restitution to the IRS in the amount of $356,172. 
Documents introduced at the time of the guilty plea reflect that, between January 1, 2011, and May 8, 2012, while working as a tax preparer at American Tax Service in Pensacola Rankins aided, assisted, counseled, and advised others in the preparation and presentation of fraudulent and false tax returns. The tax returns prepared by Rankins falsely represented the taxpayers’ business expenses and falsely claimed educational credits which resulted in taxpayers receiving approximately $356,172 in refunds and credits that the taxpayers were not entitled to receive. 
The case resulted from the investigation by the Internal Revenue Service — Criminal Investigation. It was prosecuted by Assistant United States Attorney J. Ryan Love.

posts.title: 중학교 때는 수학공부를 잘했는데 고등학교 진학 후 수학점수가 나오지 않아요~[김제 수학 학원 늘품]
posts.text:
교육팁 중학교 때는 수학공부를 잘했는데 고등학교 진학 후 수학점수가 나오지 않아요~[김제 수학 학원 늘품] 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/true125/221134684810 안녕하세요~ FUN선생입니다.
김제에서 상담오시는 부모님들 중에 위 제목처럼 중학교 때는 수학공부를 잘했는데 고등학교에 진학하더니 수학점수가 엉망이라고 하소연 하시는 분들을 많이 봅니다.
대입에서 수학은 절대적인 과목이라고 할 수 있는데요. 문과를 가든 이과를 가든 수학은 잘해야 하는 과목입니다.
전교 1등을 했던 아이다~특목고를 준비하는 아이다~우리아이는 공부를 좀 잘 한다~하시는 분들의 자녀를 저희가 확인해보면 수학 실력이 그냥 평범한 경우가 대부분입니다.
이유는 김제 중학교의 수학시험문제 수준이 좀 낮다는데 있습니다. 깊은 사고력을 묻는 수학 문제들 보다는 공식외워서 대입해서 풀면 풀 수 있는 수학 문제가 거의 대부분입니다. 그러니 아이들은 거기에 맞춰 그 정도만 수학 공부를 합니다.
그런데 고등학교에 진학하면 상황은 달라집니다. 수능모의고사라는 전국단위 시험을 보게 되고 내신 수학 문제도 훨씬 까다로워집니다.
중학교 때 수학을 좀 깊게 공부하지 않았던 학생의 경우에는 고등학교에 올라가서 낭패를 보기 쉽죠.
제가 아이들에게 말하는 수학 실력의 기준이 있습니다. 쎈(문지집입니다.)에 있는 C단계 문제와 B단계문제의 난이도가 비슷하게 보이면 고등학교에 들어가서도 수학을 잘할거라고 얘기해줍니다. 대부분의 학생들은 수학문제집인 쎈에 있는 C단계는 거들떠도 안봅니다. 학교시험에 안나오니까요.
우리아이가 수학을 잘 하기를 바라시는 분들은 학교 수학 시험 점수에 현혹되지 마시고 수학공부를 좀 깊이 있게 시키실 필요가 있겠습니다.
물론 수학 문제집 한 권에 있는 모든 수학 문제를 풀 수 있을 때까지 다른 수학 문제집은 푸시면 안되구요.
수학 노트도 잘 활용하시면 됩니다.
수학은 대입의 KEY입니다. 잘 준비하시기 바랍니다~

posts.text:
Portfolio : l’île de Man, le petit paradis fiscal des îles britanniques Plein écran Portfolio : l’île de Man, le petit paradis fiscal des îles britanniques LE MONDE | 07.11.2017 à 09h25 
C’est une petite île sans histoire qui se retrouve soudain sous les projecteurs du monde entier avec les révélations des « Paradise Papers ». 
Depuis des années, le petit paradis fiscal de l’île de Man fait commerce d’une fiscalité ultra-avantageuse pour tirer son épingle du jeu… au risque de laisser son secteur financier dévorer son âme. Le Monde est parti à la découverte de cet étrange territoire indépendant qui prospère dans l’ombre du Royaume-Uni.

posts.title: Masuk Katalog Alexis, Widuri Agesty Alami Kerugian Ini
posts.text:
Masuk Katalog Alexis, Widuri Agesty Alami Kerugian Ini Altov Johar Selasa, 7 November 2017 15:40:28 Widuri Agesty (Altov Johar / tabloidbintang.com) 
TABLOIDBINTANG.COM - Widuri Agesty harus menelan kerugian atas pencantutan fotonya, yang masuk dalam katalog Alexis. 
Terutama orang tua yang merasa terpukul mengetahui foto anaknya terpajang di katalog tersebut. 
"Kerugian banyak banget sih. Kayak beberapa PH pending, karena minta kejelasan hukum kasus ini. Keluarga yang melahirkan saya, pukulan terbesar banget anaknya ada di katalog itu," kata Widuri, di Polda Metro Jaya, Selasa (7/11). Baca juga: 
Bukan hanya itu, Krisna Murti selaku kuasa hukum Widuri Agesty menambahkan, katalog Alexis yang beredar juga berdampak besar pada pekerkaan kliennya. "Sampai diberhentikan oleh iklan. Hal seperti ini kan dirugikan," sambung Krisna. Widuri Agesty (Altov Johar / tabloidbintang.com) 
Widuri mengaku syok saat pertama kali mengetahui fotonya ikut terpampang di katalog Alexis. Padahal saat dikonfirmasi, pihak Alexis mengaku tidak pernah merilis katalog itu. 
"Pertama kali dikirimin sama teman, syok. Saya dapat dari beberapa DM di IG. Dari Alexis ya juga. Kalau dari Alexis bilang tidak pernah keluarkan katalog itu," jelasnya. 
Atas kerugian yang diderita, Widuri Agesty melaporkan akun yang diduga menyebar katalog Alexis ke Polda Metro Jaya. Saat ini polisi masih akan menyelidiki akun yang diketahui bernama Lucil. 
(tov/ray)

posts.title: (USA-SC-Mt Pleasant) Mortgage Loan Originator
posts.text:
Home View All Jobs ( 2,176,746 ) D.R. Horton, Inc. Mortgage Loan Originator in Mt Pleasant , South Carolina 
D.R. Horton, Inc., the largest homebuilder in the U.S. , was founded in 1978 and is a publicly traded company on the New York Stock Exchange. It is engaged in the construction and sale of high quality homes designed principally for the entry-level and first time move-up markets. The Company also provides mortgage financing and title services for homebuyers through its mortgage and title subsidiaries. Please visit our website at www.drhorton.com for more information. 
D.R. Horton, Inc. is currently looking for a Mortgage Loan Originator for their Financial ServicesBranch. The right candidate willpromote andprovide business development, origination of loans, relationship management with customers and clients. 
Essential Duties and Responsibilities 
o Spend adequate time in builder communities earning the business 
o Provide weekend coverage in builder communities and grand opening functions 
o Make presentations on loan products in Sales Meetings and with Sales staff in builder communities 
o Develop sales leads for mortgages in builder communities and real estate offices 
o Follow-up, for business development, with visitor/lead cards of buyers who do not purchase D.R. Horton homes 
o Develop a detailed marketing plan annually to include business development/sales strategy with on-site sales representatives and outside Realtors 
o Meet with the Branch Manager on a quarterly basis to review the marketing plan and results 
o Responsible for marketing of DHI Mortgage’s products and services to potential business sources for the purpose of loan originations 
o Educate and train potential business sources (captive and non-captive) via sales presentations 
o Responsible for content and accuracy of all marketing materials 
o Represent DHI Mortgage in a professional manner at industry-related functions 
Initial Loan Application: 
o Meet routinely with builder sales representatives 
o Prepare prospective applicants for the initial loan application meeting 
o Obtain all required signatures on the Loan Application 
o Submit file through the Automated Underwriting system 
o Review all documentation provided by borrower, check for accuracy and address any discrepancies 
o Conversation Log must clearly note status of any required documentation not included in the file 
Other Duties: 
o Daily Pipeline Management (loan application to funding process) 
o Quality Control - be familiar and comply with all DHI Mortgage's QC policies, review updates to manual and attend meetings as necessary 
o Provide input to management 
o Attend production/staff meetings 
o Special projects as assigned by branch manager 
o Infrequently, assist in resolving post-closing/funding problems 
Education and/or Experience 
Bachelor's degree (B. A.) from four-year college or university; or one to two years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience. 
Licensed mortgage loan officer as required by state. 
Come join a winning team with a Fortune 500 company! We are growing fast and are looking for enthusiastic attitudes and team players to join our success. We offer an excellent benefits package including vision, medical and dental./Build YOUR future with D.R. Horton,America's Builder./ 
// 
Come follow our newest Open Jobs on Twitter and like us on Facebook!

thread.title: Toàn quốc - Prudential chia sẻ giúp người dân Hà Tĩnh ổn định cuộc sống sau bão số 10
thread.title_full: Toàn quốc - Prudential chia sẻ giúp người dân Hà Tĩnh ổn định cuộc sống sau bão số 10

posts.author: azurelight
posts.title: Toàn quốc - Prudential chia sẻ giúp người dân Hà Tĩnh ổn định cuộc sống sau bão số 10
posts.text:
Đã gần 1 tháng bão số 10 đi qua, nhưng trên nét mặt, trong từng câu chuyện kể của những người dân vùng bão Hà Tĩnh, nỗi ám ảnh vẫn chưa nguôi và những khó khăn của cuộc sống vẫn còn đó. Chị Nguyễn Thị Hải Yến, cán bộ mảng chính sách xã hội của UBND xã Kỳ Hải cho biết, trong số những hộ gia đình đang sinh sống trên địa bàn xã, có 16 gia đình có hoàn cảnh đặc biệt khó khăn. Hầu hết họ đều là phụ nữ, người già và trẻ nhỏ đang sinh sống trong những ngôi nhà lụp xụp nên khi thiên tai xảy ra, cuộc sống của họ càng lâm vào bế tắc.
Đến nay, phần lớn những gia đình này mới chỉ khắc phục tạm thời những hư hỏng, thiệt hại để ổn định cuộc sống, về lâu dài, họ vẫn cần sự hỗ trợ từ cộng đồng để gia cố nhà cửa, chống chọi với thiên tai. Không chỉ mang đến vô vàn khó khăn cho người dân, thiên tai còn tàn phá hàng loạt công trình hạ tầng với con số thiệt hại lên tới hàng nghìn tỷ đồng. Trường học, trạm y tế, công trình dân sinh...ở nhiều nơi hư hỏng nặng nề, rất cần nguồn lực để khắc phục.
Tiếng gọi từ vùng bão đã thôi thúc nhiều tổ chức cộng đồng và các doanh nghiệp thực hiện những chương trình an sinh xã hội nhằm sẻ chia gian khó, xoa dịu những nỗi đau, trong đó có Prudential. Vào trung tuần tháng 10, doanh nghiệp này đã tổ chức buổi thăm hỏi, trao quà tặng cho người dân các địa phương chịu thiệt hại nặng nề sau bão số 10 tại tỉnh Hà Tĩnh. Dù chưa hết ám ảnh về sự tàn phá của thiên tai và những khó khăn chồng chất sau đó, những người dân vùng bão Hà Tĩnh cũng cảm thấy ấm lòng khi đón nhận những tình cảm, sự sẻ chia của doanh nghiệp.
Về với vùng bão Hà Tĩnh trong những chuyến đồng hành khắc phục hậu quả thiên tai, Prudential còn đóng góp số tiền 50 triệu đồng giúp trường THPT Kỳ Lâm (huyện Kỳ Anh) sửa chữa cơ sở vật chất bị hư hỏng do bão. Đây là ngôi trường dành cho học sinh 5 xã vùng thượng Kỳ Anh, nơi vừa chịu những ảnh hưởng rất lớn cả về nhà cửa cũng như những cánh rừng nguyên liệu mà mỗi gia đình đã trồng, chăm sóc nhiều năm qua.
Được biết, tất cả những hoạt động trên nằm trong khuôn khổ chương trình “Hỗ trợ phòng tránh và giảm thiểu rủi ro thiên tai” do Prudential Việt Nam phối hợp với Tổng Cục Phòng chống Thiên tai (Bộ NNPTNN) và Quỹ Hỗ trợ Phòng tránh Thiên tai miền Trung thực hiện. Trong khi Prudential đang nỗ lực triển khai chương trình tại các tỉnh miền Trung nhằm khắc phục hậu quả do bão số 10, cơn bão số 11 cũng đã đi vào đất liền và đang “hoành hành” tại các tỉnh miền núi phía Bắc.
Công ty Bảo Hiểm Nhân Thọ Prudential Việt Nam:
Hotline: 1800 1247.

thread.title_full: Hubertusmesse in Heilig Kreuz

posts.author: no-reply@marktspiegel-verlag.de (Birgit Schröder)
posts.title: Hubertusmesse in Heilig Kreuz
posts.text: Region Sehnde Lokales Hubertusmesse in Heilig Kreuz Hubertusmesse in Heilig Kreuz SEHNDE (bs). Am Sonntag, dem 12. November um 11.00 Uhr lädt die ev.-luth. Kirchengemeinde Sehnde zu einem besonderen herbstlichen Gottesdienst ein. Gefeiert wird die Hubertusmesse mit den Jagdhornbläsern des Hegerings „Das Große Freie“ unter der Leitung von Meike Unger.Am 3. November war der Hubertustag, an dem traditionell an den heiligen Hubertus, den „Apostel der Ardennen“ erinnert wird, dem nach seiner Legende an einem Karfreitag ein Hirsch mit einem leuchtenden Christuskreuz zwischen seinen Geweihstangen entgegentrat und ihn daran erinnerte, dass auch die des Waldes Tiere Geschöpfe Gottes sind. Ihnen nachzujagen, um sie einfach nur zu töten ist ein Vergehen gegen die Tiere und gegen Gott. Jagd und Hege sind zwei Seiten des verantwortlichen Umgangs mit den Tieren, die in Wald und Feld leben.

thread.title: Paradise Papers
thread.title_full: HappyMama.be • Toon onderwerp - Paradise Papers

posts.author: Emmeke
posts.title: Paradise Papers
posts.text:
2 van de vernoemde bedrijven zijn er die geregeld aan de kassa passeren bij het uitdelen van subsidies. Eentje heeft zo goed als gratis de grond gekregen waar hun gebouwen op staan. Op deze manier is het niet moeilijk om winst te maken en deze door te sluizen. Hier een deel belastingen op hun winst betalen zou hun sieren. Maar .... vermoedelijk hebben ze deze gunsten gekregen om zich hier te vestigen en dan zullen onze heren ministers dit zo laten.
Gast schreef:
Met alle respect maar dit is gewoon onzin, he. Als zelfstandige betaal je al v l meer belastingen dan 'de gewone mens'. De belastingen die ze betalen zijn ook tig keer meer dan wat ze halen bij 'de gewone mens'. Misschien moeten alle bedrijven dan maar staatseigendom worden, he? Zoals in China...
Ook betalen ze via de lonen van de mensen die ze tewerk stellen al meer dan genoeg. In deze tijd waarbij bedrijven echt geen problemen hebben om te verhuizen naar andere landen moet je echt 'alles naar buiten brengen'.
Iedereen weet dat en weet je? Ze doen niets illegaals. Blijkbaar denken mensen verkeerdelijk dat bedrijven sociale instellingen zijn waarbij ze mensen moeten tewerkstellen, een bezigheid geven en dan nog liefst om niets te doen.
Dat ze eens beginnen met de parallele economie in Brussel, Gent, enz aan te pakken waarbij bepaalde bedrijven totaal geen jaarrekeningen indienen, niet in orde zijn met RSZ , gtotaal geen belastingen betalen en sjoemelen met c4-en, enz zoals die bakkerij in Gent.
Ik denk dat daar eerder veel geld te rapen valt.
Om hun activiteiten te versassen hebben niet lang nodig. De verhuis is trouwens al bezig. Ik ben curieus hoe lang busbouwer Van Hool nog hier blijft. Feit is dat de loonkosten en bijkomende cadeautjes, hier verschrikkelijk hoog zijn. Enkele jaren geleden kwamen de meeste lonen bij ziekte van de sociale zekerheid. Nu, is de eerste periode voor de werkgever. Werd men vroeger ontslagen dan kreeg men een werkloosheidsvergoeding. Nu een ontslagvergoeding, soms van vele maanden, door de werkgever. Als je dit allemaal bij elkaar telt is voor bedrijven die produceren de rekening snel gemaakt. De transportkosten om hun goederen hier te krijgen wegen niet op tegen loonkosten.
Van mij mogen ze al de bedrijven die hier bewust met buitenlandse werkkrachten werken extra belasten. Helaas, dit zal niet vlug gebeuren want in veel van die bedrijven hebben hoge piefen het voor het zeggen. vb. Een groot bouwbedrijf zette hier jaren geleden en RVT. De spreektaal was Pools en die mogen zonder problemen 7 op 7 werken. Hoeveel die mannen juist per uur verdienen kan niemand controleren want het zijn zogezegd zelfstandigen. In veel gevallen kosten die maar 1/3 per gewerkt uur dus kunnen er 3 werken voor hetzelfde loon als een arbeider hier. Dat is kassa, kassa hé. Nog een nadeel is dat het grootste deel van ons geld naar het buitenland vertrekt doch hierover rept niemand een woord.

thread.title: FETÖ'nün yurt müdürüne hapis cezası
thread.title_full: FETÖ'nün yurt müdürüne hapis cezası

posts.title: FETÖ'nün yurt müdürüne hapis cezası
posts.text:
FETÖ'nün yurt müdürüne hapis cezası 07 Kasım 2017 Salı, 11:39 
GAZİANTEP (AA) - Gaziantep'te Fetullahçı Terör Örgütü/Paralel Devlet Yapılanması'na (FETÖ/PDY) üye olduğu iddiasıyla yargılanan örgütün eski yurt müdürü 8 yıl 9 ay hapis cezasına çarptırıldı. 
8. Ağır Ceza Mahkemesinde görülen davanın duruşmasına tutuklu sanık Mehmet Göğebakan ile avukatı katıldı. 
Göğebakan savunmasında, atılı suçlamaları kabul etmeyerek, "Ben ByLock denilen bir program yüzünden uzun süredir tutukluyum. Bu suçu işleseydim söylerdim ancak ben sadece bir yurtta çalıştım. Çalışmış olduğum yurda başvururken siyasi görüşünü, anlayışını sorgulamadım. Ayrıca FETÖ'nün yurdu olduğunu da bilmiyordum. Suçsuzum." diye konuştu. 
Mahkeme savcısı mütalaasında, sanığın FETÖ'nün yurdunda müdür olarak görev yaptığını, örgütün gizli haberleşme programı ByLock kulladığını ve yanında çalışanlara da bu programı yüklediğinin belirlendiğini ifade ederek, cezalandırılmasını talep etti. 
Mahkeme heyeti, sanığa "silahlı terör örgütüne üye olma" suçunun işleniş biçimi ve kastı nedeniyle 8 yıl 9 ay hapis cezası verdi. İLGİLİ HABERLER

posts.author: Orimisan Yinka (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.text:
No doubt, Panshak Zamani, aka Ice Prince, has enjoyed his own share of success in the music industry with songs like Oleku and Aboki , but for a while now, the rapper seems to have lost his magic that once charmed a large number of music lovers. 
A few days ago, a fan on social media, who targeted Olamide, dragged Ice Prince’s name into the mess also. He tweeted, “Olamide will soon become an up-and-coming artiste like Ice Prince.” While Olamide replied with unprintable words, Ice Prince didn’t comment on the post. In a conversation with Ice Prince, however, he told Sunday Scoop that only God decides how popular a song would become. He stated, “My duty is to create music, but how far the music goes is not for me to decide. God did what He did for Ice Prince and He did what He did for the Nigerian music industry. Music evolves and if God blesses an artiste to make a song that has a huge impact, such a person shouldn’t claim he is responsible for the glory. It is God, not the artiste. “I don’t know if you will ask 2Baba when he will release another African Queen or you will ask 9ice when he will make another Gongo Aso . Will you ask Olu Maintain when he is dropping another Yahooze . I made Oleku , and I have also done other great songs.” Ice Prince admitted that his song, Oleku , was his breakthrough single in the music industry. According to him, before Oleku, he won the Hennessy Artistry Competition in 2009 and he was already doing well.

thread.title_full: HappyMama.be • Toon onderwerp - Paradise Papers

posts.author: Gast
posts.text:
Emmeke schreef: Citaat: Ageas, Nike en Janssen Pharmaceutica duiken op in de gelekte Paradise Papers. Dat berichten De Tijd, Knack en Le Soir vandaag op hun website. De drie Belgische media konden dankzij het Internationaal Consortium van Onderzoeksjournalisten (ICIJ) en de Duitse krant Süddeutsche Zeitung de 13,4 miljoen documenten inkijken. Volledig artikel HLN
Tiens, nu komt iets boven wat iedereen al jaren weet, en daar wordt dan zo'n ophef rond gemaakt? Degenen die de regels maken, zijn ook degenen die weten hoe ze die moeten omzeilen... Ach, ik hoop dat er nu eens werk van gemaakt wordt, in plaats dat ze geld blijven zoeken bij de gewone mensen!
Met alle respect maar dit is gewoon onzin, he. Als zelfstandige betaal je al v l meer belastingen dan 'de gewone mens'. De belastingen die ze betalen zijn ook tig keer meer dan wat ze halen bij 'de gewone mens'. Misschien moeten alle bedrijven dan maar staatseigendom worden, he? Zoals in China...
Ook betalen ze via de lonen van de mensen die ze tewerk stellen al meer dan genoeg. In deze tijd waarbij bedrijven echt geen problemen hebben om te verhuizen naar andere landen moet je echt 'alles naar buiten brengen'.
Iedereen weet dat en weet je? Ze doen niets illegaals. Blijkbaar denken mensen verkeerdelijk dat bedrijven sociale instellingen zijn waarbij ze mensen moeten tewerkstellen, een bezigheid geven en dan nog liefst om niets te doen.
Dat ze eens beginnen met de parallele economie in Brussel, Gent, enz aan te pakken waarbij bepaalde bedrijven totaal geen jaarrekeningen indienen, niet in orde zijn met RSZ , gtotaal geen belastingen betalen en sjoemelen met c4-en, enz zoals die bakkerij in Gent.
Ik denk dat daar eerder veel geld te rapen valt.

thread.title: 9 - Ab Aeterno
thread.title_full: Season 6 Episode 9 - Ab Aeterno - MyMedia-Forum.com

posts.author: Dew
posts.title: 9 - Ab Aeterno
posts.text:
Episode 9  Ab Aeterno
Written by: Melinda Hsu Taylor and Greggory Nations
Directed by: Tucker Gates
 in a hospital in Russia. A woman with her head bandaged, lies in a bed. A man enters the area and sits down next to her. It is Jacob visiting Ilana.]
JACOB : [in Russian] I'm sorry I couldn't make it sooner.
ILANA : [in Russian] I'm very happy to see you.
JACOB : I'm here because I need your help. Will you help me, Ilana?
ILANA : [nods] Yes.
JACOB : There's six people I need you to protect. I'm gonna give you a list of their names. This is what you've been preparing for.
ILANA : [takes a deep breath.] These people, who are they?
JACOB : They're the remaining candidates.
 island. Ilana, Sun, Frank, Ben, Jack, Hurley, Miles and Richard are sitting around a campfire at night.]
JACK : Candidates? Candidates for what?
SUN : To replace Jacob. She said I was one of them and so are you and so is Hurley.
FRANK : Well, that's great. So what do we do now?
ILANA : I don't know.
JACK : Then who does?
[ Russian hospital. Ilana has the bandages removed and is speaking with Jacob.]
ILANA : After I've brought them to the Temple [pause] what do I do?
JACOB : Ask Ricardus. He'll know what to do next.
[Switch back to the campfire on the island.]
HURLEY : Who's Ricardus?
[Ilana pauses then turns around to look at Richard.]
ILANA : He is. [pause] So Richard, what do we do next?
[They all look at Richard.]
RICHARD : [laughs] I have no idea what we do next. [to Jack] You didn't tell your friends I was trying to kill myself when you found me?
[Jack shakes his head. Richard stands up.]
RICHARD : Does that sound like someone who has a plan?
ILANA : Why would Jacob say you knew what to do if ...
RICHARD : [interrupts] Because everything he ever said is a lie.
JACK : What are you talking about?
RICHARD : You wanna know a secret, Jack? Something I've known a long, long time?
[Richard walks over to Jack, leans down to look at Jack, face to face.]
RICHARD : You're dead.
HURLEY : You mean that figuratively, right?
RICHARD : No. I mean, literally. We're all dead, every single one of us. And this, [pause] this, all this? It's not what you think it is. We're not on an island. We never were. We're in hell. So, I'm not interested in what Jacob said. In fact, maybe it's time we stopped listening to him and we started listening to someone else and that's exactly what I'm gonna do.
[They look around at each other while Richard speaks. He turns, picks up a lit torch and walks away.]
LOST Logo
[Richard is walking through the jungle at a fast pace. campfire where Ilana is loading a rifle. Jack approaches her.]
JACK : What are you doing?
ILANA : I'm going after Richard.
JACK : Why? You heard him. He doesn't, he doesn't know what we need to do next.
ILANA : He knows. Jacob told me. He has to know.
JACK : Alpert has lost his mind. He thinks that were [pause] we're in hell and if cared about what Jacob said, he wouldn't be talking about [pause] about listening to someone else.
[Ilana looks at Jack then walks away from him.]
JACK : Wait. You know who he meant?
BEN : Oh, this should be interesting.
JACK : What?
SUN : He meant Locke.
[Jack looks at Sun, then Ben.]
JACK : Locke is dead.
BEN : If it's any consolation, it's not exactly Locke.
[Jack looks over and sees Hurley speaking Spanish to someone who isn't there.]
HURLEY : ¿Por qué? Sí, yo le puedo ayudar, pero yo no sé cómo encontrarlo, yo no sé donde fue a. [Why? Yes, I can help you, but I don't know how to find him, I don't know where he went to.]
[Jack walks over to Hurley.]
JACK : Hurley. What's he sayin'?
HURLEY : Uh, [stutters] wh, what's who saying?
JACK : Jacob. I saw you talking to him.
HURLEY : I'm not talking to Jacob.
JACK : Don't lie to me, please, if you know something, anything that can help us figure out ...
HURLEY : It's not Jacob, man.
JACK : Then who is it?
HURLEY : Sorry, Jack, but this has nothing to do with you.
[Hurley turns and walks away from Jack.]
BEN : Shephard is right, you know.
ILANA : Right about what?
BEN : Richard. Going after him is a waste of time. He doesn't know anything.
 Richard walking briskly through the jungle then back to the campfire.]
ILANA : What makes you so sure?
BEN : I've know Richard since I was twelve years old. That should count for something.
FRANK : So you guys met where you were kids, huh?
BEN : No, Frank, I was a kid.
 Richard in the jungle then back to the campfire.]
BEN : Richard looked just like he does today.
FRANK : You're saying this guy doesn't age?
BEN : That's exactly what I'm saying.
[Frank nods and smirks.]
FRANK : And how the hell do you think that happened?
 Richard in the jungle. He looks around to get his bearings then starts walking again. Richard riding a brown horse. He has a beard, moustache and has his hair pulled back. The horse is at a full gallop. He rides through the countryside.]
Tenerife, Canary Islands 1867
[Richard stops and ties the horse to a post outside a home made of stone with a partially thatched roof. He goes inside. He is out of breath.
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Is that you, Ricardo?
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Yes, it's me.
[Richard walks over to her bedside. A small fire burns in the fireplace. Candles provide extra lighting.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Go back to sleep, Isabella.
[He kisses her forehead. She smiles at him. He feels her forehead and cheeks.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] You're burning up.
[He reaches into a basin and wrings the water out of a cloth. He puts the wet cloth on her forehead.]
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] I'm all right.
[Isabella starts to cough and wheeze. She grabs the cloth and puts it to her mouth. Richards checks the cloth and sees that she is coughing up blood.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish]I'm going to get a doctor.
[Richard shakes coins from a jar. Isabella is coughing again.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] God willing, I'll be back before dawn. I pray we have enough.
[Isabella kisses then removes the chain and cross from around her neck and hands it to Richard.]
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Give this to the doctor.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] No, no, no, Isabella.
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Take it, my love.
[Richard sobs and Isabella nods.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] If anything ever happened to you, [cries].
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Close your eyes. We'll always be together.
[Isabella sits up and kisses Richard on the cheek. He opens his eyes.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] I will save you.
[He kisses her on the forehead then leaves the house. Isabella holds her bible to her chest. It is nighttime. The sky is filled with heavy rain, lightning and loud claps of thunder. Richard rides his horse as fast as the horse can run. He arrives at a well to do home. He ties his horse to the post outside and enters.]
DOCTOR'S SERVANT : [shouts in Spanish] You can't come in!
[Richard enters and speaks in Spanish to the servant. The doctor is sitting at the end of a very long dining table and eating.]
DOCTOR'S SERVANT : [shouts in Spanish] You can't be here.
RICHARD : [to doctor in Spanish.] Forgive me, but I couldn't wait. My wife is very sick, sir.
DOCTOR : [in Spanish] Get him some blankets.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Thank you, sir.
DOCTOR : [in Spanish] It's not for you. You're dripping water on my floor.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] My wife is coughing blood. She needs you, please, sir.
DOCTOR : [in Spanish] Where do you live?
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Near El Secorro.
DOCTOR : [in Spanish] El Secorro? That's a half day's journey. I'm not riding all the way out there in the pouring rain. I have medicine [wipes mouth] that can save her life but it's very expensive.
RICHARD : Yes, of course, anything. Thank you, sir.
[The doctor gets up from the table and takes keys out of his vest pocket. He walks to a large armoire and unlocks it. He then puts his hand out to Richard who puts all the coins he has in the doctor's hand. The doctor looks at the coins then at Richard.]
DOCTOR : [in Spanish] Is this all you have?
[Richard hands the doctor his wife's necklace.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Now you have everything.
[The doctor inspects the cross, looks at Richard and tosses the necklace on the floor.]
DOCTOR : [in Spanish] This is worthless.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] No, no, no.
[Richard retrieves the necklace.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Please, please, sir. [begging] I'll work off the debt, I beg of you!
[Richard cups the doctor's hands.]
DOCTOR : [in Spanish] Let go of me! Get your hands off of me!
[Both men are arguing in Spanish. They tussle with each other as Richard tries to get the bottle from the doctor. Richard shoves the doctor away and he falls backward into a chair then the edge of the long table. As he lays on the floor unconscious, a pool of blood gathers from the wound on the back of his head. Richard stands and looks in horror. As he stands near the doctor, the servant returns with the blankets. Richard, realizing that he has the bottle in his hand runs out the way he entered the house. The servant watches as he leaves. Richard gets on his horse and heads for home. The pouring rain has not weakened. Richard's house. He runs in and goes straight to Isabella.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Isabella. Isabella. Isabella.
[Richard turns her head so he is looking at her. Her eyes are open. She doesn't move. He touches her face then puts his ear to her chest to hear for a heartbeat. He starts crying.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] No, no, [sits up] Isabella.]
[She is no longer alive. Men burst into his home.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish][crying] No!
 a jail cell. Richard is sitting and reading a book. The door is unlocked and a priest enters. In the background are the yells of other prisoners. Richard stands up. His wrists are shackled.]
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] I brought you some food my son.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] I'm not hungry, Father.
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] Perhaps you will be later.
[The priest places the plate down on a table.
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] May I see your bible?
[Richard hand's the priest the bible. The priest opens the page to Luke, Chapter 4 Verse 24 - 29 in the New Testament. It is written in English. The verses read as follows.]
24 And he said, Verily I say unto you, No prophet is accepted in his own country.
25 But I tell you of a truth many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias, when the heaven was shut up three years and six months, when the great famine was throughout all the land;
26 But unto none of them was Elias sent, save unto Sarepta, a city of Sidon, unto a woman that was a widow.
27 And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet; and none of them was cleansed, saving Naaman the Syrian.
28 And all they in the synagogue, when they heard these things, were filled with wrath,
29 And rose up, and thrust him out of the city, and led him to the brow of the hill whereon their city was built, that they might cast him down headlong.
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] This is in English?
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Yes, I've been teaching myself. Isabella [pause] my wife and I were going to travel to the New World. We wanted to start a family.
[The priest closes the bible.]
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] Are you prepared to make your confession?
[Richard kneels and bows his head in front of the priest. Richard makes the sign of the cross and begins his confession.]
RICHARD : [Latin] In nomine patris et filii et spiritus sancti. [In the name of the Father, Son and Holy Spirit.] Amen. [in Spanish ]Forgive me, Father, for I have sinned. Father, I [pause] killed a man. I am truly sorry. [crying] And I beg of you, Father, for God's forgiveness.
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] No.
[Richard looks up at the priest.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] What?
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] I cannot grant you absolution for murder.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Father, it was an accident. I didn't mean to harm him.
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] But you did.
RICHARD : [in Spanish][crying] Please, Father, there must be some way to earn God's forgiveness.
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] The only way to return to his grace is through penance.
RICHARD : Yes, of course. I'll do anything.
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish][chuckles] You don't have time to do anything, because tomorrow they're going to hang you. [pause] No, my son, I'm afraid the devil awaits you in hell. May God have mercy on your soul.
[The priest turns and leaves the cell. He is still holding Richard's bible. The door is locked again. Richard is left speechless. It is now daylight. Richard stands by the barred window. His cell door is unlocked and in walks priest and two men to escort Richard to the gallows.]
FATHER SUAREZ : [in Spanish] Blindfold him.
[Richard stands still while one man puts a black blindfold on him. Richards is walked out of the cell. He is praying in Spanish.]
They are met by a man dressed in a uniform.]
MR. WHITFIELD : Is this him?
FATHER SUAREZ : Yes.
[The man inspects Richard's hands then fights to open his mouth.]
RICHARD : ¿Qué está haciendo? [What are you doing?]
FATHER SUAREZ : Estate quieto. [Keep quiet.]
[The man checks Richard's teeth.]
MR.WHITFIELD : You say he speaks English.
MAN : Yes, Mr. Whitfield.
[Whitfield removes Richard's blindfold.]
MR.WHITFIELD : Do you speak English? I asked, do you speak English?
[Richard does not respond.]
MR.WHITFIELD : Take him away and bring me another. Hang him.
[Richard is dragged away by the two men.]
RICHARD : Yes, I speak it! Yes, I speak it!
MR.WHITFIELD : Wait!
[Richard is led back to Whitfield.]
MR.WHITFIELD : You have strong hands. What sort of work did you do?
RICHARD : I [pause] I work [pause] I work [pause] in the fields.
MR.WHITFIELD : I understand you're interested in going to New World. Yes?
RICHARD : Yes.
MR.WHITFIELD : Well, then this is your lucky day. Thank you, Father.
[Whitfield hands the priest a bag of coins.]
MR.WHITFIELD : This man is now the property of Captain Magnus Hanso. [to Richard] I hope you don't get seasick.
 a storm at sea. As lightning flashes, Black Rock is painted on the back of the ship. The storm is thrashing the ship about in the ocean. A crewman is hanging on the edge of the hatch leading to men chained to the inside of the ship as a wave tosses him about. Thunder rumbles as lightning cracks in the night sky. Men are shouting in Spanish below deck]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Can you see anything?
CHAINED MAN : [in Spanish] It's too dark. Wait! I can see land! I see the shore. It is an island.
[Richard shouts with glee. As the lightning lights the night sky, a large stone statue is seen on the shoreline.]
CHAINED MAN : [in Spanish] I see the devil! The island is guarded by the devil!
[Richard sits back down and grabs the cross around his neck. Suddenly the ship crashes into the statue. The scene changes to daytime. The storm is over. Rubble from the ship is strewn in the jungle. The Black Rock is sitting on land in the jungle. inside the ship. The chained men are lying on the floor unconscious. One man starts coughing.
CHAINED MAN : [in Spanish] God spared us.
[Richard wakes up slowly and looks at the man.]
CHAINED MAN : [in Spanish] At least some of us.
[As the man tries to stand up, Richard rolls over and hears a voice on deck.]
CREW MEMBER : Do you see anything?!
[Richard looks up through a grate. There are indistinct conversations occurring.]
MR.WHITFIELD : Bring me the captain.
CREW MEMBER : Sir, Captain Hanso's dead.
MR.WHITFIELD : Good God, we're in the middle of a bloody jungle.!
[Richard starts yelling for help.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Down here! Down here! Help us!
CHAINED MAN : Estamos aquí!. Estamos aquí! [We're alive! We're alive!]
RICHARD : Down here. Down here, please! Help! Down here! Please!
CHAINED MAN : [in Spanish] We're down below!
RICHARD : Down here! Please help us! Down here!
CHAINED MAN : [in Spanish] We are here! We are here!
[All the chained men start yelling for help. A man starts walking down the steps to below deck. The men are happy to see Whitfield.]
RICHARD : Gracias a Dios. Gracias. [Thank you God! Thank you.] Muchas Gracias. [Thank you very much.]
[Whitfield draws his sword.]
RICHARD : No! Stop! No!
[Whitfield puts his sword through the heart of one of the chained men. He does the same to the second man in chains.]
RICHARD : No! Stop!
CHAINED MAN 3 : [in Spanish] No. No.
CHAINED MAN 4 : [in Spanish] No, no, no, no, no.
[Whitfield plunges his sword into the third and fourth man as they beg for their lives.]
CHAINED MAN 5 : No, señor. [No, sir!]
RICHARD : No! Stop! No! What are you doing?
[Whitfield is killing every man that is chained below deck. One man is on his knees.]
CHAINED MAN 6 : Se lo ruego. No lo haga. No log haga, por favor. [I ask you. Do not do this, Do not do this, please.]
MR. WHITFIELD : We are shipwrecked in the middle of the jungle. We have no fresh water and limited supplies, and there are only five officers left.
[Whitfield stabs the begging man.]
RICHARD : No! No! No!
[Richard is the last man alive in chains.]
RICHARD : Why? Why are you doing this?
MR.WHITFIELD : Because if I freed you, it would only be a matter of time before you tried to kill me.
[Whitfield draws back his sword and a sound of a rattlesnake and a loud howl fill the air.]
RICHARD : No.
[Whitfield looks around. As the sounds get louder, the ship rocks and the remaining crewmembers scream. Loud bangs and tossing about is heard on deck. The ship rocks side to side. Richard and Whitfield look up through the grate and see a man being thrown through the air as a cranking sound begins. It gets quiet.]
MR. WHITFIELD : What happened up there?
[Blood is dripping from the grate onto Whitfield's shoulder. Things are being moved around on deck.]
MR.WHITFIELD : I said report!
[Suddenly a large column of thick, black smoke comes down through the grate and pulls Whitfield up through it. The rattling and howling resume. Richard tries to break free of his chains. A deep, loud growling accompanies the rattling as the billowing smoke travels down the stairs and stops right in front of Richard who is terrified. Lights flash on and off in the smoke. Richard closes his eyes and starts praying in Spanish. All the strange noises begin to fade away. Richard opens his eyes. The ship creaks and then there is silence. Richard, now alone, tries to loosen a floorboard. Suddenly there is a crack of lightning and a clap of thunder. It is raining again. Richard tries to stretch his neck to reach a stream of rain falling through another grate. The chains prevent him from reaching the water. Tired and weak, Richard continues to work on the floorboard. He successfully extracts a long nail. He begins to dig away around the ring fastened to the side of the ship. Attempts to pull the mounting bracket out are unsuccessful. He falls asleep. Richard is awakened by a strange sound. He struggles to look for the source. He sees a boar eating one of the dead chained men. He slowly picks up the nail.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Get out of here!
[The boar charges at him.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] I'll kill you!
[As the boar gets closer, Richard lunges at the boar and jabs the nail in its chest as it runs out of the ship. Richard turns and sees the nail, clean, lying on the floor. Richard's eyes are wide open as he notices the nail on the floor. He stretches as far as he can to retrieve the nail to no avail. It is just out of reach. The scene changes to Richard sitting up against the side of the ship. He is tired, thirsty and very alone. The silence is broken.]
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Hello? Is anyone here? Is there anyone here?
[Richard slowly turns in the direction of the voice.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Yes, yes! I'm here!
[Richard looks and faintly sees Isabella.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Isabella?
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Ricardo!
[She is wearing the same gown she died in. She hugs Richard.]
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Ricardo!
[He hugs her and she sobs.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] I don't understand. How are you [pause] here?
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Don't you know, Ricardo? We're dead, both of us. We're in hell. I'm here to save you before he comes back.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Who? Before who comes back?
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] The devil.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] The devil?
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] I looked in his eyes and I saw was evil. Have you seen him, Ricardo?
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Yes, I think I have.
[Isabella tries to free Richard from his chains.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] No, no.
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] We have to get out of here.
[Howling and rattling is heard outside. They both are frightened. Growling starts as pieces of debris fall below deck.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Go. Now! Run my love! Go now!
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] I can't ...
RICHARD : [in Spanish] I said I would save you my love! No! I said I would save you and I will, my love.
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] I'm scared.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] If you love me, go! Go!
[The sounds grow louder. As Isabella gets to the top of the steps, she screams.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] No! No! [cries out] Leave her alone! Leave her alone! Leave her alone, please!
[The sounds get weaker.]
RICHARD : [crying] Isabella! Isabella!
[Richard crumbles to the floor, sobbing. The scene changes and Richard is asleep on the floor. His wrists, still in the chains, are badly bruised. A person is walking below deck. There is clanking. A man is carrying a metal cup, pitcher and a lantern. He places them down and touches Richard's shoulder. Richard slowly awakens. As he rolls over and sees the man, he quickly stands up and backs away.]
MIB : Shh, here, water.
[The man pours water into the cup and puts it to Richard's lips. Richard is hesitant but drinks from the cup. Richard speaks with a raspy voice.]
RICHARD : Who, who [pause] who are you?
MIB : A friend.
RICHARD : I am [pause] in hell?
MIB : [nods] Yes, I'm afraid you are.
RICHARD : You, you were not on the ship.
[MIB sits back.]
MIB : I was here [pause] long before your ship.
RICHARD : [stutters] Did, did, did you see my, my wife?
MIB : I'm sorry?
RICHARD : Isabella, my wife. She was here. She was but then the black smoke came, and she ran.
MIB : And she hasn't come back?
[Richard mouths the word no.]
MIB : That probably means he has her.
RICHARD : Who?
MIB : I think you know who.
RICHARD : If she's a-alive, I must save her. Please, please help me.
MIB : Of course, of [pause] of course I'll help you. I want to be free, too. As luck would have it [dangles keys] I found these on one of the officers outside. I think they'll work but before I try, I need to know that you will help me.
RICHARD : Yes, yes, of, of course.
MIB : You'll do anything I ask?
RICHARD : Yes, yes, anything, yes, I promise.
MIB : Then we're agreed.
[MIB unlocks Richard's chains. Richard's wrists are blistered and bloody. He falls back on a sack and smiles at being able to move his arms.]
RICHARD : Thank you.
MIB : Of course, my friend. It's good to see you out of those chains.
RICHARD : Thank you.
[MIB gets up and helps Richard to his feet.]
MIB : We're gonna have to get you on your feet.
[MIB has Richard's arm around his shoulders.]
MIB : You're gonna need your strength if we're going to escape.
RICHARD : Escape?
MIB : That's right. I'm afraid there's only one way to escape from hell. You're going to have to kill the devil.
[The scene switches Richard and MIB sitting by a fire. A boar is roasting on a spit. Richard eats as MIB silently watches.]
MIB : When you're finished eating, you'll walk due west. Once you get to the ocean, you'll be able to see the statue.
RICHARD : The statue?
MIB : Your ship smashed through it on its way inland, broke it into pieces. That's where you'll find the devil.
[MIB carefully removes a long, dagger with an ornate sheath, pommel, grip and guard, from a piece of cloth. He hands it to Richard.]
MIB : You only have one chance. Put this through his chest. Do not hesitate. Do not let him say a word. If he speaks, it will already be too late. He can be very persuasive.
RICHARD : [chuckles] How, how can I kill him with this? He, he is [pause] black smoke.
MIB : No. I am.
RICHARD : My wife Isabella [pause] she was running from you?
MIB : She was running from him. I'm sorry. I saw him take her but I couldn't do anything to stop him.
RICHARD : But, but if you are the black smoke, you ...
MIB : [interrupts] You aren't the only one who's lost something, my friend. The devil betrayed me. He took my body, my humanity.
RICHARD : You , you killed the officers on the ship.
MIB : I'm not the one you need to worry about. The devil has your wife and you are going to have to kill him if you ever want to get her back.
RICHARD : Murder is wrong. That is what brought me here.
MIB : My friend, you and I can talk all day long about what's right or wrong, but the question before you remains the same. Do you ever want to see your wife again?
RICHARD : [long pause] Yes, I do.
[MIB holds the dagger in front of Richard and he takes it. MIB gets up, pats Richard on the shoulder and walks away. Richard walking through the jungle. When he reaches the beach, he stops and looks around to see only a foot remaining of the statue. He marches to it with the dagger in his hand. Rubble from the statue and ship are strewn along the beach. He stops and draws the dagger from its sheath and continues to walk toward the remaining base of the statue. He passes a doorway in the base and is suddenly punched from the side and falls to the ground. As he tries to stand up he is kicked back to the ground. He tries to stand up and is punched in the face and he falls back to the ground.]
RICHARD : [panting] Uhh!
[He positions the dagger in his right hand, gets up and quickly turns ready to stab overhand. The man grabs his wrist and bicep and twists him to the ground, punches him in the face and retrieves the dagger.]
JACOB : What are you doing here? Who gave you this?
RICHARD : Where is my wife?
JACOB : What?
[Richard sits up and rests on his forearms.]
RICHARD : Where is my wife?
JACOB : I, I don't know your wife. Did she come here on the ship?
RICHARD : No, she's dead.
JACOB : Then why are you asking me where she is? [pause] Did you meet a man in the jungle dressed in black?
RICHARD : [eyes wide open] Yes.
JACOB : What did he tell you?
RICHARD : He said you are the devil.
JACOB : And?
RICHARD : He said the only way I would see my wife again is if I kill you. I, I saw her here, in this place. Where is she?!
JACOB : That wasn't your wife.
RICHARD : Yes, it was! She is dead, just like me.
JACOB : You're not dead.
RICHARD : I, I am in hell. I know that I am in hell!
JACOB : You really think you're dead?
RICHARD : Where else would I be?
[Jacob throws the dagger into the sand and walks to Richard. He grabs Richard by the shirt.]
JACOB : All right then.
RICHARD : What are you doing? What are you doing?]
[Jacob pulls and forces Richard into the surf.]
RICHARD : No, no, no, no!
[As a wave breaks, Jacob pushes Richard underwater and holds him there for a few seconds. He pulls him up out of the water.]
JACOB : [shouts] Still think you're dead?
RICHARD : Aah!
[Jacob pushes Richard under the water again then pulls him out.]
RICHARD : Aah!
[Jacob pushes Richard yet again in the water. He pulls him back out.]
JACOB : Still think you're dead?
RICHARD : Stop!
[Jacob pushes him under and quickly pulls him out.]
JACOB : Why should I stop?
RICHARD : Because I want to live!
[Jacob pulls Richard out of the surf by the back of his shirt and drops him on the beach.]
JACOB : That's the first sensible thing you've said. What's your name?
RICHARD : Ricardo.
JACOB : Ricardo get up. We need to talk.
 Richard sitting on the beach with a blanket around him and Jacob approaching him carrying a bottle of wine and two cups. He sits next to Richard then pours the wine.]
RICHARD : What is inside?
JACOB : No one comes in unless I invite them in.
[Jacob hands one to Richard then pours a cup for himself. Jacob raises his cup to Richard, winks and takes a drink from it.]
RICHARD : Are you the devil?
JACOB : [smiles] No.
RICHARD : Then who are you?
JACOB : My name is Jacob. I'm the one who brought your ship to this island.
RICHARD : You brought it here? [pause] Why?
[Jacob takes another drink from his cup. He puts it down and picks up the bottle of wine.]
JACOB : Think of this wine as what you keep calling hell. There's many other names for it, too. Malevolence, evil, darkness and here it is swirling around in the bottle unable to get out because if it did, it would spread. [picks up cork] The cork is this island. [pushes the cork into the bottle] And it's the only thing keeping the darkness where it belongs.
[Jacob hold the bottle upside down and the cork prevents any wine from leaking out.]
JACOB : That man who sent you to kill me believes that everyone is corruptible because it's in their very nature to sin. I bring people here to prove him wrong. And when they get here, their past doesn't matter.
RICHARD : Before you brought my ship, there were others?
JACOB : Yes, many.
RICHARD : What happened to them?
JACOB : They're all dead.
RICHARD : But if you brought them here, why didn't you help them?
JACOB : Because I wanted them to help themselves, to know the difference between right and wrong without me having to tell them. It's all meaningless if I have to force them to do anything. Why should I have to step in?
RICHARD : If you don't, he will.
[Jacob sits and thinks then speaks.]
JACOB : Do you want a job?
RICHARD : What? A job?
[Jacob smiles and nods.]
RICHARD : Doing what?
JACOB : Well, if I don't want to step in, maybe you can do it for me. You can be my [pause] my representative, an intermediary between me and the people I bring to the island.
RICHARD : Well, what will I get in return?
JACOB : You tell me.
RICHARD : I want my wife back.
JACOB : Can't do that.
RICHARD : Can you absolve me of my sins so I don't go to hell?
JACOB : I can't do that either.
RICHARD : Then I never want to die. I, I want to live forever.
[ JACOB : [smiles] Now that [touches Richard] I can do.
 Richard walking through the jungle back to MIB who stands up when he sees Richard.]
MIB : [points] You let him talk to you, didn't you?
RICHARD : He told me to give you this.
[Richard hands a white stone to MIB.]
MIB : [smiles] I'm sure you realize that if you go with him you'll never be with your wife again. I understand. He can be very convincing. But I want you to know if you ever change your mind, and I mean ever, my offer still stands.
[MIB and Richard look at each other. Richard says nothing.]
MIB : I have something for you.
[MIB reaches into his pocket, takes something out, hands it to Richard and closes Richard's hand. You must've dropped it. I found it on the ship.
[Richard looks to see Isabella's necklace with the cross. When he looks back up, MIB is gone. Richard walks to a stone bench, crouches, digs a hole and begins to cry. He kisses the cross then buries the necklace.]
RICHARD : [in Spanish] Good bye, my love.
[The scene switches back to present time. Richard is still on his trek away from the beach camp. He looks around and finds the stone bench under a large tree, similar to an acacia tree. He digs up Isabella's necklace.]
RICHARD : I've changed my mind. Are you listening to me? I've changed my mind.
[Richard stands up.]
RICHARD : [shouts] I was wrong! You said I could change my mind. You said the offer would stand! Does the offer still stand? [louder] Does the offer still stand?!
[An aerial view of the tree and surrounding foliage is shown. Richard's voice echoes.]
RICHARD : Does the offer still stand?
[Richard hears someone approaching and turns around to see Hurley approaching him.]
HURLEY : What offer, dude?
RICHARD : What the hell are you doing out here? Did you follow me?
HURLEY : Well, kinda.
RICHARD : Get, get out! Get out!
[Richard pushes Hurley.]
HURLEY : Hey!
RICHARD : Did, didn't you hear what I said?
HURLEY : Look, I was just ...
RICHARD : I told you people, I don't know anything.
HURLEY : Dude, just calm down!
RICHARD : Why did you follow me?
HURLEY : Your wife sent me!
RICHARD : What did you say?
HURLEY : I said your wife sent me, Isabella. She wants to know why you buried her cross.
RICHARD : H, how do you know about that?
HURLEY : Because she just told me.
RICHARD : What do you mean, just told you?
HURLEY : Isabella saw you dig it up, man. She's standing right next to you.
[The ghost of Isabella is standing next to Richard.]
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] He doesn't believe you.
[Hurley nods.]
HURLEY : [in Spanish] Sometimes it takes people a while.
RICHARD : [stutters] I, I, I don't see her.
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] Tell him his English is beautiful.
HURLEY : She's right there. She says your English is awesome.
RICHARD : [cries] [in Spanish] Are you [pause] really there?
ISABELLA : Cierra tus ojos.
HURLEY : She wants you to close your eyes.
[Richard looks at Hurley in amazement.]
HURLEY : It's okay. I'll tell you what she says.
[Richard closes his eyes.]
ISABELLA : No fue tu culpa que yo morí, Ricardo.
HURLEY : [in Spanish] It wasn't your fault that I died, Ricardo.
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] As much as you wanted to save me [pause] it was my time.
[Richard starts to cry. Isabella puts her hand on Richard's cheek.]
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] You've suffered enough, Ricardo.
RICHARD : [in Spanish] I miss you. I would do anything for us to be together again.
ISABELLA : [in Spanish] My love. We are already together.
[She kisses his cheek. As the camera moves from over Hurley's left should to his right shoulder, Isabella is gone]
RICHARD : Is she gone?
HURLEY : [nods] Yeah.
[Richard puts her necklace on.]
RICHARD : Thank you.
HURLEY : Yeah, you got it.
RICHARD : Something wrong?
HURLEY : Well she kinda said one more thing. Something you have to do.
RICHARD : What?
HURLEY : She said you have to stop the man in black. You have to stop him from leaving the island 'cause if you don't todos vamos al infierno [we all go to hell.]
[Richard looks at Hurley and says nothing. The camera shows an aerial view of the tree and surrounding foliage. MIB/Locke is looking toward the tree. The scene switches back to shortly after Richard went to stab Jacob. MIB is sitting on a log under a palm tree. Jacob joins him.]
JACOB : Good morning.
MIB : Morning.
[MIB is gently tossing the white rock from one palm to the other.]
JACOB : I see you got my present.
MIB : Don't gloat Jacob. It doesn't become you.
JACOB : So you tried to kill me.
MIB : What do you expect, an apology?
JACOB : No. I guess I'm just wondering why you did it.
MIB : [angry] Because I want to leave. Just let me leave, Jacob.
JACOB : As long as I'm alive, you're not going anywhere.
MIB : Well, then now you know why I want to kill you and I will kill you Jacob.
JACOB : Even if you do, somebody else will take my place.
MIB : Well then, I'll kill them, too.
[MIB raises his eyebrows at Jacob. Jacob reaches in his shirt, takes out the bottle of wine and hands it to MIB.]
JACOB : Here, something for you to pass the time.
[MIB takes the bottle. Jacob stands up.]
JACOB : I'll see you around.
MIB : Sooner than you think.
[MIB grabs the bottle by the neck and breaks in on the log.]
LOST logo
END

posts.title: Lazer tedavisiyle vücutta çıkan lekelere son
posts.text:
TEKNOLOJİDE KADINLARIN ZAMANI Lazer tedavisiyle vücutta çıkan lekelere son Ciltte melanin maddesinin yüksek olması leke olmasına neden olduğunu belirten Dr. Emrah Çinik, lazerle vücutta çıkan lekelerin tedavi edilebileceğini söyledi.Çinik Estetik Kliniğinden Dr. Emrah Çinik, “Melanin cildimize rengini veren maddedir.... 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:20   @BursaHaberMedya 
Ciltte melanin maddesinin yüksek olması leke olmasına neden olduğunu belirten Dr. Emrah Çinik, lazerle vücutta çıkan lekelerin tedavi edilebileceğini söyledi. 
Çinik Estetik Kliniğinden Dr. Emrah Çinik, “Melanin cildimize rengini veren maddedir. Cilt lekeleri melaninin normalin üzerinde konsantre olarak bulunduğu bölgelerdir. Melaninin anormal yüksek miktarlarda belli bölgelerde toplanarak cilt lekeleri oluşturması çeşitli sebeplerden kaynaklanır. Bu lekelerin bazıları doğumdan itibaren vardır. Bir kısmı yaşın ilerlenmesi sonucu, bir kısmı ise güneşin cildimize verdiği hasarlardan kaynaklanmaktadır” dedi. 
Lazerle leke tedavisi uygulanması esnasında lazer enerjisinin, konsantre şekilde melanin içeren hücreler tarafından abzorbe edilirken, diğer normal cilt renginde olan hücreleri etkilemediğini ifade eden Dr. Çinik, “Bunlar üzerindeki etkisi çok azdır. Lazerle leke tedavisi uygulanacak bölgeler güneşten veya bronzlaştırıcı losyonlardan dolayı bronzlaşmış olmamalıdır. Cildin bronzlaşmadan kaynaklanan daha koyu renkli kısımları da lazer ışınlarını absorbe edebilir ve bunun sonucunda ciltte iritasyon veya su toplama gibi etkiler görülebilir. Lazerle leke tedavisi genelde çok ağrılı bir yöntem değildir. Tedavinin daha konforlu olmasını sağlamak için anestezik kremler veya buz torbası kullanılabilir. Lazerle leke tedavisi için başka bir ön hazırlığa gerek yoktur” diye konuştu. 
Dr. Emrah Çinik, lazerle leke tedavisinin uygulanacağı cilt lekesi tiplerini şöyle sıraladı: 
“Kahverengi yaşlılık lekeleri, Karacier bozukluklarından kaynaklanan cilt lekeleri, Doğum lekeleri, Güneş lekeleri, Lentigolar (ör:solar lentigo, lentigo simplex), Seboreik keratoz, Cafe-au-Lait Lekeleri, Şarap lekesi, Melasma, Yaralanma sonucu oluşan cilt lekeleri, Skleroterapi Sonrası oluşan cilt lekeleri, Çiller, Bazı ben(nevüs) tipleri - Lazerle ben tedavisi, Ota nevüsü, Ito nevüsü, Mavi nevüs, Nevüs spilüs, Becker nevüsü, Nevoselüler nevüs” Dr. Çinik, “Cilt kanserleri veya cilt kanseri öncüsü lezyonlara lazer tedavisi uygulanmaz. Lezyonun klinik muayenesinde şüphe görülmesi halinde biyopsi alınır ve lezyonun cilt kanseri veya başlangıcı olmadığından emin olduktan sonra tedavi planlanır. Lazerle leke tedavisi işlemine başlamadan bu konuda uzman bir dermatoloğa muayene olmanız önerilir. Doktorunuz lezyonunuza uygun tedavi yöntemini belirleyecek ve hangi yöntemle nasıl bir sonuç alabileceğiniz konusunda sizi bilgilendirecektir. Uygulanacak tedavi, seans sayısı, seans aralıkları etkili bir tedavi için uzman doktorunuz tarafından kişiye özel planlanır” şeklinde konuştu. 1
